title: Trump repeals landmark climate finding. Here's what to know.
shortDescription: Trump's repeal of the endangerment finding eliminates the legal basis for federal regulations that target air pollution from greenhouse gases.

title: Jackson accuses Jones of unconstitutional campaign financing in lawsuit
shortDescription: Rick Jackson, a late entry into the Georgia's governor race, sued fellow candidate Burt Jones over campaign finance concerns.

title: Trump ends Minnesota immigration operation
shortDescription: Border Czar Tom Homan announced the end of Minnesota's immigration operation after fatal shootings heightened tension and community backlash.

title: ICE surge to end in MN. Immigration officials testify before Congress.
shortDescription: The drawdown comes amid the continued fallout from the fatal shootings of Alex Pretti and Renee Nicole Good by federal agents in Minneapolis.

title: House overturns Trump's Canada tariffs
shortDescription: The Republican controlled House of Representatives voted to overturn President Donald Trump’s tariffs on Canada.

title: Daily Briefing: Votes for women threatened
shortDescription: How Trump-backed SAVE Act could curb votes for married women. Here is the news to know on Thursday.

title: Emotional appeals from Democrats to recognize Epstein victims | The Excerpt
shortDescription: The House Judiciary Committee hearing saw repeated barbs between Democrats and Attorney General Pam Bondi.

title: House passes bill that could make voting harder
shortDescription: A bill called the SAVE America Act could potentially prevent millions of Americans from voting, according to experts.

title: Trump king coal? President accepts industry award
shortDescription: Flattering President Donald Trump with speciality prizes has become all the rage in Washington.

title: Coal industry joins Apple, FIFA in paying tribute to Trump with award
shortDescription: A pro-coal group gave President Donald Trump an award at a White House event where he directed the Pentagon to buy electricity from coal plants.

title: House passes bill that would require citizenship proof to vote
shortDescription: The House of Representatives passed a bill on Feb. 11 that would require proof of citizenship to vote.

title: Trump loses on tariffs as House Republicans rebuke president
shortDescription: The House of Representatives on Feb. 11 voted to overturn President Trump's Canadian tariffs – the first in what could be a series of rebukes.

title: Approval of Trump's immigration policies tumbles in new poll
shortDescription: In an NBC News survey taken the week after Alex Pretti's death in Minneapolis, Americans appear to sour on Trump and immigration enforcement tactics.

title: This rep's decision has big implications for control of Congress
shortDescription: Florida Republican Neal Dunn's potential early resignation could further shrink the GOP's already thin U.S. House majority.

title: Former President Barack Obama's journey to the White House
shortDescription: Barack Obama was the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017. Take a look at his life in photos.

title: Trump reaffirms he's excluding two Democratic governors from meeting
shortDescription: President Trump rejected claims from the National Governors Association that he agreed to open up a White House meeting to all governors.
